tool_description: Calculates travel times between stops considering traffic conditions, vehicle performance, dwell times, and route characteristics.

route_paths.description: Route path identifiers or geometry references

time_period.description: Time period for analysis (peak, off_peak, weekend)

include_dwell_time.description: Whether to include passenger boarding/alighting time

error_messages: Invalid vehicle type: Use one of [bus, light_rail, subway, tram].
Route paths not found: Check that all route_paths exist in the network data.
Invalid time period: Use one of [peak, off_peak, weekend].
usage: Provide route paths and vehicle type. Optionally specify time period and dwell time inclusion. Returns segment-by-segment travel time estimates.

segment_travel_times.description: Travel time in minutes for each route segment

total_route_times.description: End-to-end travel time for each complete route

average_speed.description: Average operating speed across all routes in km/h
